channel.title: Coupled Systems on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in Coupled Systems on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Day 1 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Welcome! How to get started with Complexity Methods for the Behavioural Sciences Introduction to Complexity Science Introduction to the mathematics of change: Growth models Coupled dynamics Demystifying deterministic chaos Tentative time table for Day 1 When What Who Topics Notes 09.30-11.00 Opening Event Prof. Dr. Paul Hendriks, Dean of the Nijmegen School of Management; Group Picture Location: Aula, Comeniuslaan 2 11.

item.title: Day 3 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Delay-embedding Phase/State space reconstruction Recurrence Quantification Analysis Early Warning Signals (EWS) of phase transitions Tentative time table for Day 3 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Quantifying temporal patterns in unordered categorical time series data FH Categorical Auto-Recurrence Quantification Analysis 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.00-12.00 Assignments Categorical RQA, Surrogate analysis 12.
